name: Voicemails
description:
What would you say to someone if you know they'd never hear it?

A short game inspired by finding my first cell phone when cleaning and going through the contacts list.

Leave messages for people who will never hear them.

Based around personal experiences with the loss of friends and family.

Development

Made in Unity with Fungus.

Resources Fonts
  • Daniel - Daniel Midgley
  • Luna - Amanda Leeson
  • Louis George Café - Chen Yining
  • Handwriting - Jeremy Paz
  • LCD / LCD Mono - Samuel Reynolds

Download Directions

Download the .zip file. Unzip it. Open the folder and launch the .exe file. Size is set to 1024 x 768.
